Interface UserDataInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface UserDataInterface
extends java.io.Serializable
    Data interface for getting the user data

    • Method Detail

      • getUserDetails

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getUserDetails(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> detailKeys)
                                                             throws UserDataInterfaceException
        Get the user details hashmap on sending ArrayList of respective valid keys. All details HashMap returned on sending empty ArrayList. Throws exception on sending invalid key.
        Parameters:
        detailKeys - the list of the keys for which user data is needed
        Returns:
        hashmap of user's details
        Throws:
        UserDataInterfaceException
        Since:
        1903
